body: @Daishinshi Thanks! I just thought it was really confusing due to the transition to her sitting there with her clothes on again and him being flustered. Not being able to understand the text didn't help either lol.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry, dont forgive me

@jidgeeboy The girl forced the boy to masturbate with VR headset on as  a Batsu Game, but the headset was unplugged. He sensed that she was serving him so he just took off the headset and had a real sex
I liked the first one the most, but it was also confusing due to not understanding Japanese. Did the sex actually happen or did the guy just imagine it?
